name: Racing Car HighWay: iland Sea
description:
Racing Car HighWay: iland Sea is an extremely adventurous highway racing game. Just enjoy the ultimate racing fever in extreme situations. The highway traffic gives you the amazing and most satisfying traffic escape experience which you would never learn in any driving school.
Feature:
- Real racing drift
- Dynamic background music
- Dress up your racing car
- Simple and smooth control
- Stunning visual effects
- Dangerous and difficult to control Road
- Highly realistic racing game
- High speed racing mode
